Vendor Cookie Policy

Last updated: December 2024

What Are Cookies?

Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device when you visit our vendor dashboard. They help us provide you with a better experience by remembering your preferences and improving our service.

Types of Cookies We Use

Essential Cookies

These cookies are necessary for the vendor dashboard to function properly. They include:

  • Session management and login authentication
  • Security features and fraud prevention
  • Payment processing security

Functional Cookies

These cookies enhance your vendor experience by remembering:

  • Your language preferences and dashboard settings
  • Menu customizations and layout preferences
  • Previously accessed reports and analytics
  • Time zone and location settings

Analytics Cookies

We use these to understand how you use the vendor platform:

  • Dashboard page views and navigation patterns
  • Feature usage and performance metrics
  • Error tracking and troubleshooting
  • Platform optimization insights

Marketing & Performance Cookies

These cookies help us improve our vendor program:

  • Tracking campaign effectiveness
  • Understanding vendor engagement patterns
  • Platform improvement recommendations

Managing Cookies

You can control and manage cookies in several ways:

  • Most browsers allow you to delete cookies from your computer
  • You can configure your browser to reject cookies
  • You can set your browser to notify you when cookies are being used
  • Some browsers offer private browsing modes that don't store cookies

Note: Disabling certain cookies may affect vendor dashboard functionality and your ability to access your account or process orders.

Third-Party Cookies

We may use third-party services that set their own cookies:

  • Payment processors for secure financial transactions
  • Analytics services to analyze vendor dashboard usage
  • Customer support and chat tools
  • Cloud infrastructure providers

Cookie Duration

Cookies have different lifespans:

  • Session Cookies: Deleted when you close your browser
  • Persistent Cookies: Remain on your device for specific periods (usually 6-24 months)

Data Processing & Privacy

Any personal data collected through cookies is processed in accordance with our Vendor Privacy Policy. Your data will never be shared with third parties without your consent, except where necessary to operate the platform.

Updates to This Policy

We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date.
